title: I'll Be Damned
description: A sister kidnapped.An impending war between Heaven and Hell looming around the corner.A Grand Witch who has no idea what she is.The Prince of Darkness’s obsession in claiming her.Two sinfully gorgeous men pulling her in two different directions.As the owner of the coffee shop Deja Brew in Savannah, Georgia, Anna thought her life was ordinary. That is until her sister is kidnapped by a demon, prompting two handsome men to march into her life unexpectedly. Valen, the sinfully gorgeous, overprotective werewolf who is Anna’s sworn guardian and Roman, the most handsome and powerful Warlock in the entire Netherworld.Suddenly, her world is stripped of everything she knows and replaced with frightening news about who she really is - a powerful Grand Witch. Now, it’s up to her to draw out her dormant magic, rescue her sister and stop an impending heavenly war threatening to eradicate the human race all while staying alive.
author: Casey Keen
